item.title: Omega Group plc- Pay Discrimination
item.description: Omega Group plc- Pay Discrimination omega <- read_csv(here("omega.csv")) glimpse(omega) # examine the data frame ## Rows: 50 ## Columns: 3 ## $ salary <dbl> 81894, 69517, 68589, 74881, 65598, 76840, 78800, 70033, ... ## $ gender <chr> "male", "male", "male", "male", "male", "male", "male", ... ## $ experience <dbl> 16, 25, 15, 33, 16, 19, 32, 34, 1, 44, 7, 14, 33, 19, 24... At the last board meeting of Omega Group Plc.

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me Hi Everyone! I am Sarah (Yian) Jiang. I am currently studying in Masters in Financial Analysis program at London Business School. I acquired a bachelor degree from Tsinghua University in accounting. I am currently pursuing a job in product management. To let you know more about me, I have attached my resume below. You can also reach out to me thorough the contacts shown in the homepage.

item.title: Life Expectancy, GDP per Capita, Primary School Enrollment, Mortality Rate and HIV Prevalence
item.description: Gapminder revisited In this section, we will look at data on Life expectancy at birth (life_expectancy_years.csv) GDP per capita in constant 2010 US$ (https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) Female fertility: The number of babies per woman (https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SP.DYN.TFRT.IN) Primary school enrollment as % of children attending primary school (https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SE.PRM.NENR) Mortality rate, for under 5, per 1000 live births (https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SH.DYN.MORT) HIV prevalence (adults_with_hiv_percent_age_15_49.csv): The estimated number of people living with HIV per 100 population of age group 15-49.

item.title: Where Do People Drink The Most Beer, Wine And Spirits?
item.description: Where Do People Drink The Most Beer, Wine And Spirits? In this analysis, we are going to discuss where people drink the most beer, wine and spirits. We we would like to install the package and load the original data in the beginning. #Install the fivethirtyeight package - as the data used i.e."drinks" is part of the package library(fivethirtyeight) data(drinks) Before we start, we want to answer these questions: What are the variable types?
